data.name: Gen4 Image Turbo
data.description: Gen-4 Image Turbo is cheaper and 2.5x faster than Gen-4 Image. An image model with references, use up to 3 reference images to create the exact image you need. Capture every angle.

schema_parameters.name: seed
schema_parameters.description: Random seed. Set for reproducible generation
schema_parameters.title: Seed

schema_parameters.name: prompt
schema_parameters.description: Text prompt for image generation
schema_parameters.title: Prompt

schema_parameters.name: resolution
schema_parameters.description: Image resolution
schema_parameters.title: resolution

schema_parameters.name: aspect_ratio
schema_parameters.description: Image aspect ratio
schema_parameters.title: aspect_ratio

schema_parameters.name: reference_tags
schema_parameters.description: An optional tag for each of your reference images. Tags must be alphanumeric and start with a letter. You can reference them in your prompt using @tag_name. Tags must be between 3 and 15 characters.
schema_parameters.title: Reference Tags

schema_parameters.name: reference_images
schema_parameters.description: You must give at least one reference image. Up to 3 reference images are supported. Images must be between 0.5 and 2 aspect ratio.
schema_parameters.title: Reference Images

text.name: prompt
text.description: Text prompt for image generation

text.name: reference_tags
text.description: An optional tag for each of your reference images. Tags must be alphanumeric and start with a letter. You can reference them in your prompt using @tag_name. Tags must be between 3 and 15 characters.

numeric.name: seed
numeric.description: Random seed. Set for reproducible generation

enum.name: resolution
enum.description: Image resolution

enum.name: aspect_ratio
enum.description: Image aspect ratio

file.name: reference_images
file.description: You must give at least one reference image. Up to 3 reference images are supported. Images must be between 0.5 and 2 aspect ratio.

data.input_schema: {"type":"object","title":"Input","required":["prompt"],"properties":{"seed":{"type":"integer","title":"Seed","nullable":true,"description":"Random seed. Set for reproducible generation"},"prompt":{"type":"string","title":"Prompt","description":"Text prompt for image generation"},"resolution":{"enum":["720p","1080p"],"type":"string","title":"resolution","description":"Image resolution","default":"1080p","x-order":3},"aspect_ratio":{"enum":["16:9","9:16","4:3","3:4","1:1","21:9"],"type":"string","title":"aspect_ratio","description":"Image aspect ratio","default":"16:9","x-order":2},"reference_tags":{"type":"array","items":{"type":"string"},"title":"Reference Tags","default":[],"description":"An optional tag for each of your reference images. Tags must be alphanumeric and start with a letter. You can reference them in your prompt using @tag_name. Tags must be between 3 and 15 characters."},"reference_images":{"type":"array","items":{"type":"string","format":"uri"},"title":"Reference Images","default":[],"description":"You must give at least one reference image. Up to 3 reference images are supported. Images must be between 0.5 and 2 aspect ratio."}}}

data.name: Hailuo 02
data.description: Hailuo 2 is a text-to-video and image-to-video model that can make 6s or 10s videos at 768p (standard) or 1080p (pro). It excels at real world physics.

schema_parameters.name: prompt
schema_parameters.description: Text prompt for generation
schema_parameters.title: Prompt

schema_parameters.name: duration
schema_parameters.description: Duration of the video in seconds. 10 seconds is only available for 768p resolution.
schema_parameters.title: duration

schema_parameters.name: resolution
schema_parameters.description: Pick between standard 512p, 768p, or pro 1080p resolution. The pro model is not just high resolution, it is also higher quality.
schema_parameters.title: resolution

schema_parameters.name: last_frame_image
schema_parameters.description: Last frame image for video generation. The final frame of the output video will match this image.
schema_parameters.title: Last Frame Image

schema_parameters.name: prompt_optimizer
schema_parameters.description: Use prompt optimizer
schema_parameters.title: Prompt Optimizer

schema_parameters.name: first_frame_image
schema_parameters.description: First frame image for video generation. The output video will have the same aspect ratio as this image.
schema_parameters.title: First Frame Image

text.name: prompt
text.description: Text prompt for generation

enum.name: duration
enum.description: Duration of the video in seconds. 10 seconds is only available for 768p resolution.

enum.name: resolution
enum.description: Pick between standard 512p, 768p, or pro 1080p resolution. The pro model is not just high resolution, it is also higher quality.

file.name: last_frame_image
file.description: Last frame image for video generation. The final frame of the output video will match this image.

file.name: first_frame_image
file.description: First frame image for video generation. The output video will have the same aspect ratio as this image.

data.name: Pixverse V5
data.description: PixVerse V5, latest AI video generation model that offers fast rendering speeds, high-end motion quality and cinematic detailing.

schema_parameters.name: seed
schema_parameters.description: Random seed. Set for reproducible generation
schema_parameters.title: Seed

schema_parameters.name: image
schema_parameters.description: Image to use for the first frame of the video
schema_parameters.title: Image

schema_parameters.name: effect
schema_parameters.description: Special effect to apply to the video. V5 supports effects. Does not work with last_frame_image.
schema_parameters.title: effect

schema_parameters.name: prompt
schema_parameters.description: Text prompt for video generation
schema_parameters.title: Prompt

schema_parameters.name: quality
schema_parameters.description: Resolution of the video. 360p and 540p cost the same, but 720p and 1080p cost more. V5 supports 1080p with 8 second duration.
schema_parameters.title: quality

schema_parameters.name: duration
schema_parameters.description: Duration of the video in seconds. 8 second videos cost twice as much as 5 second videos. V5 supports 1080p with 8 second duration.
schema_parameters.title: duration

schema_parameters.name: aspect_ratio
schema_parameters.description: Aspect ratio of the video
schema_parameters.title: aspect_ratio

schema_parameters.name: negative_prompt
schema_parameters.description: Negative prompt to avoid certain elements in the video
schema_parameters.title: Negative Prompt

schema_parameters.name: last_frame_image
schema_parameters.description: Use to generate a video that transitions from the first image to the last image. Must be used with image.
schema_parameters.title: Last Frame Image

text.description: Text prompt for video generation

text.name: negative_prompt
text.description: Negative prompt to avoid certain elements in the video

numeric.name: seed
numeric.description: Random seed. Set for reproducible generation

enum.name: effect
enum.description: Special effect to apply to the video. V5 supports effects. Does not work with last_frame_image.

enum.name: quality
enum.description: Resolution of the video. 360p and 540p cost the same, but 720p and 1080p cost more. V5 supports 1080p with 8 second duration.

enum.name: duration
enum.description: Duration of the video in seconds. 8 second videos cost twice as much as 5 second videos. V5 supports 1080p with 8 second duration.

enum.name: aspect_ratio
enum.description: Aspect ratio of the video

file.name: image
file.description: Image to use for the first frame of the video

file.name: last_frame_image
file.description: Use to generate a video that transitions from the first image to the last image. Must be used with image.

data.name: Ray 2 720p
data.description: Generate 5s and 9s 720p videos

schema_parameters.name: loop
schema_parameters.description: Whether the video should loop, with the last frame matching the first frame for smooth, continuous playback.

schema_parameters.name: prompt
schema_parameters.description: Text prompt for video generation

schema_parameters.name: concepts
schema_parameters.description: List of camera concepts to apply to the video generation. Concepts include: truck_left, pan_right, pedestal_down, low_angle, pedestal_up, selfie, pan_left, roll_right, zoom_in, over_the_shoulder, orbit_right, orbit_left, static, tiny_planet, high_angle, bolt_cam, dolly_zoom, overhead, zoom_out, handheld, roll_left, pov, aerial_drone, push_in, crane_down, truck_right, tilt_down, elevator_doors, tilt_up, ground_level, pull_out, aerial, crane_up, eye_level

enum.description: Duration of the video in seconds

enum.name: aspect_ratio
enum.description: Aspect ratio of the generated video

file.name: end_image
file.description: An optional last frame of the video to use as the ending frame.

file.name: start_image
file.description: An optional first frame of the video to use as the starting frame.

file.name: end_image_url
file.description: Deprecated: Use end_image instead

file.name: start_image_url
file.description: Deprecated: Use start_image instead

data.input_schema: {"type":"object","title":"Input","required":["prompt"],"properties":{"loop":{"type":"boolean","title":"Loop","default":false,"description":"Whether the video should loop, with the last frame matching the first frame for smooth, continuous playback."},"prompt":{"type":"string","title":"Prompt","description":"Text prompt for video generation"},"concepts":{"type":"array","items":{"type":"string"},"title":"Concepts","description":"List of camera concepts to apply to the video generation. Concepts include: truck_left, pan_right, pedestal_down, low_angle, pedestal_up, selfie, pan_left, roll_right, zoom_in, over_the_shoulder, orbit_right, orbit_left, static, tiny_planet, high_angle, bolt_cam, dolly_zoom, overhead, zoom_out, handheld, roll_left, pov, aerial_drone, push_in, crane_down, truck_right, tilt_down, elevator_doors, tilt_up, ground_level, pull_out, aerial, crane_up, eye_level"},"duration":{"enum":[5,9],"type":"integer","title":"duration","description":"Duration of the video in seconds","default":5,"x-order":3},"end_image":{"type":"string","title":"End Image","format":"uri","description":"An optional last frame of the video to use as the ending frame."},"start_image":{"type":"string","title":"Start Image","format":"uri","description":"An optional first frame of the video to use as the starting frame."},"aspect_ratio":{"enum":["1:1","3:4","4:3","9:16","16:9","9:21","21:9"],"type":"string","title":"aspect_ratio","description":"Aspect ratio of the generated video","default":"16:9","x-order":4},"end_image_url":{"type":"string","title":"End Image Url","deprecated":true,"description":"Deprecated: Use end_image instead"},"start_image_url":{"type":"string","title":"Start Image Url","deprecated":true,"description":"Deprecated: Use start_image instead"}}}

data.name: Wan 2.2 T2v Fast
data.description: Fast Wan 2.2 text to video with 480p. Ultra-fast open source text to video model. Video model under 30 second output.

schema_parameters.name: seed
schema_parameters.description: Random seed. Leave blank for random
schema_parameters.title: Seed

schema_parameters.name: prompt
schema_parameters.description: Prompt for video generation
schema_parameters.title: Prompt

schema_parameters.name: go_fast
schema_parameters.description: Go fast
schema_parameters.title: Go Fast

schema_parameters.name: num_frames
schema_parameters.description: Number of video frames. 81 frames give the best results
schema_parameters.title: Num Frames

schema_parameters.name: resolution
schema_parameters.description: Resolution of video. 16:9 corresponds to 832x480px, and 9:16 is 480x832px
schema_parameters.title: resolution

schema_parameters.name: aspect_ratio
schema_parameters.description: Aspect ratio of video. 16:9 corresponds to 832x480px, and 9:16 is 480x832px
schema_parameters.title: aspect_ratio

schema_parameters.name: sample_shift
schema_parameters.description: Sample shift factor
schema_parameters.title: Sample Shift

schema_parameters.name: optimize_prompt
schema_parameters.description: Translate prompt to Chinese before generation
schema_parameters.title: Optimize Prompt

schema_parameters.name: frames_per_second
schema_parameters.description: Frames per second. Note that the pricing of this model is based on the video duration at 16 fps
schema_parameters.title: Frames Per Second

schema_parameters.name: interpolate_output
schema_parameters.description: Interpolate the generated video to 30 FPS using ffmpeg
schema_parameters.title: Interpolate Output

schema_parameters.name: disable_safety_checker
schema_parameters.description: Disable safety checker for generated video.
schema_parameters.title: Disable Safety Checker

schema_parameters.name: lora_scale_transformer
schema_parameters.description: Determines how strongly the transformer LoRA should be applied.
schema_parameters.title: Lora Scale Transformer

schema_parameters.name: lora_scale_transformer_2
schema_parameters.description: Determines how strongly the transformer_2 LoRA should be applied.
schema_parameters.title: Lora Scale Transformer 2

schema_parameters.name: lora_weights_transformer
schema_parameters.description: Load LoRA weights for transformer. Supports arbitrary .safetensors URLs from the Internet (for example, 'https://huggingface.co/Viktor1717/scandinavian-interior-style1/resolve/main/my_first_flux_lora_v1.safetensors')
schema_parameters.title: Lora Weights Transformer

schema_parameters.name: lora_weights_transformer_2
schema_parameters.description: Load LoRA weights for transformer_2. Supports arbitrary .safetensors URLs from the Internet. Can be different from transformer LoRA.
schema_parameters.title: Lora Weights Transformer 2

text.name: prompt
text.description: Prompt for video generation

text.name: lora_weights_transformer
text.description: Load LoRA weights for transformer. Supports arbitrary .safetensors URLs from the Internet (for example, 'https://huggingface.co/Viktor1717/scandinavian-interior-style1/resolve/main/my_first_flux_lora_v1.safetensors')

text.name: lora_weights_transformer_2
text.description: Load LoRA weights for transformer_2. Supports arbitrary .safetensors URLs from the Internet. Can be different from transformer LoRA.

numeric.name: seed
numeric.description: Random seed. Leave blank for random

numeric.name: lora_scale_transformer
numeric.description: Determines how strongly the transformer LoRA should be applied.

numeric.name: lora_scale_transformer_2
numeric.description: Determines how strongly the transformer_2 LoRA should be applied.

boolean.name: optimize_prompt
boolean.description: Translate prompt to Chinese before generation

boolean.name: interpolate_output
boolean.description: Interpolate the generated video to 30 FPS using ffmpeg

boolean.name: disable_safety_checker
boolean.description: Disable safety checker for generated video.

enum.name: resolution
enum.description: Resolution of video. 16:9 corresponds to 832x480px, and 9:16 is 480x832px

enum.name: aspect_ratio
enum.description: Aspect ratio of video. 16:9 corresponds to 832x480px, and 9:16 is 480x832px

file.name: num_frames
file.description: Number of video frames. 81 frames give the best results

file.name: frames_per_second
file.description: Frames per second. Note that the pricing of this model is based on the video duration at 16 fps

Leave blank for random"},"prompt":{"type":"string","title":"Prompt","x-order":0,"description":"Prompt for video generation"},"go_fast":{"type":"boolean","title":"Go Fast","default":true,"x-order":7,"description":"Go fast"},"num_frames":{"type":"integer","title":"Num Frames","default":81,"maximum":121,"minimum":81,"x-order":2,"description":"Number of video frames. 81 frames give the best results"},"resolution":{"enum":["480p","720p"],"type":"string","title":"resolution","description":"Resolution of video. 16:9 corresponds to 832x480px, and 9:16 is 480x832px","default":"480p","x-order":4},"aspect_ratio":{"enum":["16:9","9:16"],"type":"string","title":"aspect_ratio","description":"Aspect ratio of video. 16:9 corresponds to 832x480px, and 9:16 is 480x832px","default":"16:9","x-order":3},"sample_shift":{"type":"number","title":"Sample Shift","default":12,"maximum":20,"minimum":1,"x-order":8,"description":"Sample shift factor"},"optimize_prompt":{"type":"boolean","title":"Optimize Prompt","default":false,"x-order":1,"description":"Translate prompt to Chinese before generation"},"frames_per_second":{"type":"integer","title":"Frames Per Second","default":16,"maximum":30,"minimum":5,"x-order":5,"description":"Frames per second. Note that the pricing of this model is based on the video duration at 16 fps"},"interpolate_output":{"type":"boolean","title":"Interpolate Output","default":true,"x-order":6,"description":"Interpolate the generated video to 30 FPS using ffmpeg"},"disable_safety_checker":{"type":"boolean","title":"Disable Safety Checker","default":false,"x-order":10,"description":"Disable safety checker for generated video."},"lora_scale_transformer":{"type":"number","title":"Lora Scale Transformer","default":1,"x-order":12,"description":"Determines how strongly the transformer LoRA should be applied."},"lora_scale_transformer_2":{"type":"number","title":"Lora Scale Transformer 2","default":1,"x-order":14,"description":"Determines how strongly the transformer_2 LoRA should be applied."},"lora_weights_transformer":{"type":"string","title":"Lora Weights Transformer","x-order":11,"nullable":true,"description":"Load LoRA weights for transformer. Supports arbitrary .safetensors URLs from the Internet. Can be different from transformer LoRA."}}}
